page.title: 15Some of the Farms.
page.content: There is a fish farm at Forest Road with gold fish and some Kol Carp, they also have some other animals like goats and chickens and sheep.There is Burbush farm which has some bulls for fattening and about 27,000 chickens for food and 2 horses and 4 fields for grazing and 2 fields for hay.Mrs Duell has 1 pig and lots of cows and calves and chickens,geese and ducks.Spring Moor Farm has 6 cows,9 calves,1 bull and 10 acres of land,half for hay and the other half for grazing,they also breed rabbits for meat.Other farms are North farm,and Burley street farm.In the villages are many more private paddocks and grazing areas. By Chris Rowley, Stuart Newbury, David Ive.
